website_summaries.verdict: A premium plastic weather shield at a budget price. Good, high-quality cover for most strollers.
pros: Designed to fit a variety of strollers with a canopy
Includes side ventilation for hot weather to keep your baby cool and healthy
Front flap makes it easy to access the interior
cons: The fit with some larger strollers is loose

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok to Baby Jogger 2014 City Mini GT Single Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Using it in Vancouver, BC, Canada, known for rainy Winter (and not only). Used it 4-5 times, so far so good. Fits ok to Baby Jogger 2014 City Mini GT Single Stroller, see pics attached (with canopy fully and partially open). It is bulky but therefore seems sturdy. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Jamba Gestalten

customer_reviews.title: Entrance and exit issue
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased at how well this fit my stroller, especially because I have a dog stroller, not a baby stroller. The openings and seams are very well constructed and effectively keep out all the rain and wind. The one drawback I found was that it is hard to get the child/puppy in and out of the stroller because the shield will not open far enough. I have to actually lift it off the front of the stroller, fine if you are out of the rain, but not if you are still in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great find!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our Graco Click Connect 4 Wheel Stroller to take with us to Disneyland in case it rained. This arrived just in time and completely saved us! We seemed to be the only prepared ones there and this worked great! It was so windy and rainy for 3 of the days. This kept my child mostly dry! (Her fault not the products fault. She was kicking the plastic up with her feet and the water was coming in. She stayed warm and protected under this and I was so thankful it fit!! The plastic was thick and didn't tear. I will be using this again and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: 1lostkid

customer_reviews.title: The vents were perfect to keep my daughter as comfortable as possible in ...
customer_reviews.text: This rain shield fit perfectly on my Britax B-Agile 3 wheel stroller. The side vent panels are genius! We used this cover during a trip to Disney World in August. It was a necessity during the daily afternoon thunderstorms. The vents were perfect to keep my daughter as comfortable as possible in the high humidity. The shield provided total coverage of our stroller. Definitely better than the plastic bags & ponchos that other people were trying to use to protect their strollers!!
customer_reviews.author: AJE16Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the $12!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a different brand stroller but it still fits fairly well. I have a graco fast action fold jogger stroller (used without a car seat ) and this was able to fit over it. The foot area is slightly exposed but otherwise all of the stroller including the storage basket is covered. It keeps my daughter dry in the rain with ventilation so I don't have to worry. It also works great on cold, windy days to keep her out of the wind and warm. I was skeptical about buying this but it was well worth the money and has made walks much more climate controlled for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: JHolland

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: used this cover on our trip to disney. it wasnt cumbersome and was just the right size to fit neatly in a drawstring bag that we whipped out in case the skies opened up during an activity. it was also long enough where it covered everything from getting wet. for reference we have a GB Pockit stroller seen to the left. Another nice perk that it had vents on the sides so that my little one could stroll in it and not get wet but also not suffocate. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca F

customer_reviews.title: Can use it for Phil & Ted sports double stroller
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I bought in preparation for winter Europe trip! We have Phil & Ted sports stroller with second seat attachment. This covers both kids/seats, even though it was a bit short in length. The bottom child might get rained on a bit. In our case, we used it mostly to protect kids from severe coldness (London in March), so it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Great for rain
customer_reviews.text: I was traveling to Paris, France with my family. It was so cold there, so I used this stroller weather shield all the time to block some wind for my toddler. It was pretty successful. However, it could not block completely because there is no way to tighten the bottom side. I give 4 stars hoping they have a chance to read my feedback and improve for the future product. I WILL DEFINITELY REPURCHASE THEIR PRODUCT AGAIN AND GIVE A 5 STAR :) For the rain, it blocked completely. LOVED IT
customer_reviews.author: Jane Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This shield is great, it perfectly prevented the rain from reaching my ...
customer_reviews.text: I stayed almost 1 year in Florida without having a car. Florida=heavy summer rain!. the only option we had is to walk from home and work and Vice versa. Ofcourse my son was not able to walk long distances, we used the stroller every day and night. Therefore, I ordered this rain shield to protect him from wind and rain while strolling him. This shield is great, it perfectly prevented the rain from reaching my son. In addition, it dries out quickly. My only complain is really big and not fully foldaway.. However, this downside is not as important as being useful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, protects from rain snow wind, small storage pockets
customer_reviews.text: I have a Graco stroller and this fit perfectly on it. With the car seat in the stroller it was nice and snug and not flapping in the wind. I live on the east coast so it's perfect for the cold weather as well not just the rain. There are pockets to store small items like a toy baby bottle or even change of clothes or diaper. Baby doesn't mind it either since it's clear and be can still see and enjoy he world.
customer_reviews.author: Ecefm2012

customer_reviews.title: Fits my umbrella strollers perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these J is for Jeep covers for my Summer Infant 3D Elite umbrella strollers. They fit perfectly. I have not used them yet, but tested them to see how little ones fit under them and how comfortable they are. They look like they will be a great fit in the rain, covering the stroller and basket. Should keep the stroller dry when it’s parked in stroller parking!
customer_reviews.author: Cyberrunt

customer_reviews.title: Fit and fold week mmmm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have ready for a Disney trip coming up next week. I have a baby trend jogger stroller. It fit well both extended and kind of folded when not in use. Definitely a plus for leaving the stroller parked and ready or even a quick transition to all of sudden rain. I do also plan to use this for warmth as it's keeps most of the child or and a little cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent! Kept baby dry and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a just in case for our December trip to Disney and I am SO glad I did! Not only did it keep my baby dry on the drizzley days, it was also a life safer for keeping the wind off of him on the super cold days we ran into. He stayed dry and warm in his little bubble. It fit my Graco Breaze stroller like it was made for it! My husband laughed at me at first when I pulled it out but he soon realized how awesome it was.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle NTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for BReady stroller
customer_reviews.text: I used this stroller rain cover with my Britax BReady stroller for a rainy trip to Seattle. It covered the top seat very well, and our baby was nice and dry even in torrential downpour. It didn't cover the bottom child as much (who was sitting in the lower second seat attachment), but he still remained almost perfectly dry, unless the wind was blowing the rain into the stroller. I was very happy with this product, given that it was not made for my stroller.
customer_reviews.author: AdrianM

customer_reviews.title: Great weather cover for stroller
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality of this weather cover for my son's stroller. I really like that it has buttons to keep the plastic from moving around and the little pocket is a good add-on. My only thing is that it's a bit short, I'm not sure if it's just the case for my lightweight stroller but it covers just at my son's feet. In a few months, I'll likely have to replace with a larger one so his feet don't get wet with rain/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this rain cover for our six flags trips when it’s raining. We have used this in massive rain as well as just a drizzle and babe was kept dry. I use this on my baby jogger city mini gt as well as my Chicco liteway. Great product and I love the mesh sides.
customer_reviews.author: Sara and Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect option!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes!!! After multiple reviews from all the options I chose this and I’m glad I did!!! We used it on our vacation at a theme park and it rained cats and dogs! Baby... perfectly dry!!! Plenty of ventilation and so easy to take on and off! When we all went inside we were required to leave stroller in stroller area so we left the cover on ... while everyone else had a soaked stroller- ours was perfectly dry to sit baby back into. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Tavarez

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for anyone out and about in a city!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. We use this with a Baby Jogger City Mini and a Sunmer Infabt 3-D Lite stroller when we’re out and about in the city. Fits well, easy to put on, and it gets the job done. It is also easy to pull off of baby if it stops raining without having to take the entire cover off. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Good! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for my sister in law and I. We had 2 different borrowed strollers for our Disney trip and these covers fit great on each. After the 2 rainy days we had, there was a couple really windy days, so I continued to use ours and found it to be a nice wind deterrent for my toddler as well. It fit well, performed like advertised and was a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: jend86

customer_reviews.title: It works, at least the first time
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the package threw over the stroller... All is good... But when your done with it folding and putting it away it just doesn't work well. The plastic is very rigid and you almost feel like your going to break it trying to fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simon

customer_reviews.title: Fits Graco stroller
customer_reviews.text: This fits our Graco click connect stroller just fine. I wish I was a little longer in the front because I’m afraid when she gets bigger her feet could get wet in the rain, but so far I’ve only used it in light sprinkles or for wind/cold blocking. I like the ventilation on the sides when it is on the warmer side and raining-the snaps work great. It smelled pretty strong of plastic when we got it so I had to open it up and air it out for a few days before I felt okay about putting it over baby. Super glad I bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous rain cover for our stroller that was very thin. I love that this one has side vents and is a thicker material. It doesn’t get all fogged up but does very well at keeping the elements out so my daughter can still see everything and enjoy our walks.
customer_reviews.author: AlysonTCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: As I was getting ready to re-order this stroller cover because I lost the one I bought, I noticed on the description that It says Velcro closure. I bought this exact same cover and it did NOT come with velcro. It simply had those plastic covered metal snap buttons and the only thing that had velcro was the back pocket. Just a heads up so people don't think the whole thing is velcro sealed. I have no major complains about this cover with the simple exception that mine slightly ripped open at one of the seems but it still worked as if new...
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller cover!
customer_reviews.text: Used this at Disney World in the summer where it rains at least once a day! This was perfect! It folded up really small so we could keep it in the bottom of the stroller when not being used. Unfolded really easy and covered the entire stroller keeping our baby and bags dry but also provided enough ventilation that our daughter didn’t get hot! So happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Works for all weather.
customer_reviews.text: This was great as a weather shield from cold and wind. We took a trip to NYC and it was unexpectedly cold. This kept my little guy warm. It's pretty easy to use. It is somewhat annoying when you want to get the child in and out and the only thing to do is just wad it up out of the way. But you really can't beat if for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I don't know why it took me so long to think of getting one! Spent last winter walking in snowstorms with my baby and I only had a blanket to cover the stroller and snow got in from the wind blowing. I use this with two different strollers - one is Graco click connect and the other is a foreign stroller brand - and it fits both perfectly. The pocket in the back is useful to put your phone in as you stroll. Such a useful neat item.
customer_reviews.author: Zahidah

customer_reviews.title: Good and compact for travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought for summer infant stroller 3D lite to take to Europe... worked out great and kept her dry although as others have stated their feet may stick out a tiny bit at the bottom so had to adjust for that. Packs up very compact. Doesn’t have a zipper thing to pull back when nice again so you have to take it all the way off but didn’t really matter that much.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for First Year Ignite
customer_reviews.text: We used this with the First Year Ignite stroller - works wonderfully and creates a cozy environment for the baby with enough space to cover the diaper bag, too. The snaps across the back make accessing drinks or whatever in the handlebar pockets a breeze. The pocket is a useful addition for quick-access items. We were walking through London in a torrential downpour (reminded me of massive Texas rains). Hundreds of people were huddled under awnings, and the baby and I were the only ones on the sidewalk. I got soaked, but he was actually laughing the whole way and stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ztinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically for a rainy day at Disneyland and so glad I made this purchase. I got a ton of people asking about it and where did I get it. It worked great for our stroller and kept our toddler dry, for the most part. She did lift it up every now and then and would get her feet wet. But it kept the stroller dry when not in use too.
customer_reviews.author: Megan J

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover was SO nice. We took it to Disney this past April and it was great to have, it covered our while stroller, my kiddo could still see out (she thought it was fun) and it protected all our belongings. I would definitely buy again. Only thing is it would be nice to have something to put it back in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: This item doesn't have a front window
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it has high rate, but after using this for a couple months, I actually don't know why so many people are writing good reviews. I don't like this item because the front part doesn't open. To put my baby in and out, I have to remove the shield completely from the stroller. It can be messy when shield got wet by the rain. I also use this during winter to keep her warm, but the plastic got wrinkled and she can't see outside clearly. I think it makes a walk less exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Being a “universal size”, it fits reasonably well and is made out of durable material.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice any “plastic” smell as reported by other reviewers. It appears to be a thicker quality plastic so I expect it will be durable. I see two drawbacks: there is no way to take the child out without lifting the whole cover off, hence exposing the whole stroller to rain and the cover doesn’t extend far enough over the feet of the child and the plastic gives minimal protection to the underneath storage compartment. That being said, since this was the only cover available I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Just used it today coz it's raining
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Just used it today coz it's raining. Very helpful. I don't need to worry no more when it rains, plus it blocks the wind too. Reason I gave 4 stars bec. It didn't go all the way to the stroller, guess I really have a big stoller but still it works and help. No complaints. People even said it was cool. I will definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: DG Global

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before our trip to disney, just in case it rained. Good investment, it rained the whole time, but this kept the baby dry. Great value for the price. Was nervous about the fit, but it seems to be universal and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: LostTime

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: This worked until my child feet could reach the foot rest of the stroller, then it was too short and her feet and legs were exposed. Needs to be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for Bugaboo Cameleon
customer_reviews.text: One of the best stroller accessories I have. The original Bugaboo weather shield is a pain to install and it also does not leave the baby much air for breathing - it is almost air-tight. So the Jeep version is so easy to use, and it has all those buttons to hold the flaps, and the mesh, and the pocket... Love it! But it works with sitting baby, not with a lying one.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Seal

customer_reviews.title: That gets kind of annoying as I find myself having to re-button it every ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job although it has holes and rips already with only a few months of use. It is also a little big for our Summer Infant 3D lite but nonetheless it works.The side buttons become undone while flipping the cover up to the canopy. That gets kind of annoying as I find myself having to re-button it every single time. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: catherine molina

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cover to use with our stroller at Disney World, since the forecast said thunderstorms every day. Turns out it only rained 1 day we were there, but it was several heavy downpours. We just popped this over the stroller (Baby Trend Lightweight stroller) and it covered it perfectly. It is long enough to come down over their legs (Babies 'R Us had one for sale that looked way too short). It does have a funny plastic smell...not sure what to do about that. My daughter didn't complain though. Overall, it did the job and I'm glad we had it with us. Kept the kid and the stroller from getting soaked.
customer_reviews.author: T. Adame

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and fits well on stroller. Protection is good from bad weather. Only thing I found lacking and would make it better would be a chain in front so you can easily lift the child without removing the whole sheild.
customer_reviews.author: Rashi

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and protects kids!
customer_reviews.text: This rain shield takes seconds to install (which is important when it suddenly starts to pour) and is breathable. It fits snugly on the stroller and covers all necessary surfaces to keep the child dry. It's a fantastic enhancement to a great stroller. It folds up easily and can be stored in the stroller basket, leaving room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy FitMom

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our Disneyland trip to use on my Baby Trend stroller as it was predicted to rain the first couple days. It held up beautifully for the one day of rain we got. Used the next two days to help keep the wind off my little guy. Seems to be good quality product and will keep using until it wears out.
customer_reviews.author: daina

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice stroller rain cover and fits Britax B-Agile if the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice stroller rain cover and fits Britax B-Agile if the canopy folded to its half . There's a problem when there's wind the cover doesn't stay in it's place and need some velcro or straps in order to tight it to the stroller. So, I have added some velcros to it as a quick solution.
customer_reviews.author: Hend

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Deluxe Stroller Weather Shield
customer_reviews.text: We really love the weather shield because it allows us to take our children for walks even in the rain and wind. It works really well keeping the children dry and less cold from the wind hitting them directly. We purchased two of these for my daughter and us and we are all happy with them. The children also like them very much because it allows them to see where they are going while staying dry and a little bit warmer. We also like the fact that the weather shield works well with different strollers than the Jeep Deluxe Stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Chany

customer_reviews.title: This cover has been pretty good to us
customer_reviews.text: This cover has been pretty good to us! We used in on vacation as the forecast predicted rain. It never rained, but it sure was windy! This cover kept our kiddo nice and warm all day. I will say though, it would be awesome if the cover came with a drawstring or something to keep the bottom of the cover snug against the stroller. Other than that, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay de Jong

customer_reviews.title: Great for theme park use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in Disney over our stroller for the well-known afternoon thunderstorms. It saved us a few times from getting everything soaking wet. My child never rode in the stroller with the cover on and can image it may be a bit too hot to do so. My only complaint is that I wish it was a little longer on the sides as it didn't fully cover edges of the basket under the seat. It came with its own carrying case but was a bit difficult to roll back up to fit inside- and a bit bulky for packing. Otherwise it served its purpose well and I'm glad I brought it.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: It works great on my single umbrella stoller and on my Dream on me tandem double stroller (though that is MUCH smaller than the typical tandem stroller). It has slits on the side to open if its warm but raining, but buttons for when it's cold. It comes with a carrying case, but the case is pretty wimpy (if you stretch it too much it will rip) and the storage pouch on the outside is honestly pretty worthless too, you can't put very much in there, maybe a wallet, but I wouldn't want to advertise the wallet if it were me.) All in all, a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: In California, unfortunately, these days we're not really in need of a rain cover, but recently bought this to go travelling where it was very wet. This was great, for rain and as a wind breaker. It has side vents which allow the child to breath. It fit very nicely over a Chicco Liteway Plus stroller, and could be pushed back very neatly if not needed. Folded easily and stored nicely in the little bag that came with it, and was easy to put on if you got caught out in a shower. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: jdawser

customer_reviews.title: Good missing part
customer_reviews.text: Good to keep out the rain and even wind on a cold day. Didn’t like how hard to fold up and was supposed to come with black storage bag that I didn’t get so no where to put now that it’s open and won’t fit back into plastic case it came in.
customer_reviews.author: SANTA PANTS

customer_reviews.title: Good product but plastic smells too strong.
customer_reviews.text: Function very well. The reason I gave 2 stars is it smells plastic too strong. My baby was about to vomit when i just put on for couple mins. Then i put myself in side to smell it and i got so so so dizzy. I dont know if this smelling is gonna harm my baby since i put her inside for 1 hour. I feel sad that i like this product but i dont feel safe to use it. Plus, i got it at $19.99 and now it is $16.99 this makes me even more upset.
customer_reviews.author: Victor B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Uppababy G-Series
customer_reviews.text: Not the most amazing rain cover ever, but it definitely does fit the Uppababy G-Luxe stroller much better than the Uppababy brand rain cover. It's also half the price. Note that the Jeep Standard rain cover does not fit the Uppababy strollers. Other than being a little bit clunky to put on, tt could be longer... even the photo shows the kid's feet sticking out of the bottom. But that's probably better than the Uppababy cover where you have to cut your kid's feet off to make the rain cover fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Howizter

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to keep baby dry from wet weather
customer_reviews.text: I live in hawaii where it's common for a rain shower to pop up. This is a quick and easy way to keep baby dry. I always keep this in my stroller basket so it's available whenever I might need it. Only takes about 30 seconds to postion over the stroller. I did find the storage bag to be pretty much worthless though because I've never been able to get the cover folded up so that it fits nicely in the storage bag and for that reason I don't bother to use the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chicco liteaway
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a chicco liteaway, fit perfectly. Recommended for anyone with this stroller. We used it for Disneyland and it rained alot. My toddler didn't like not being able to see out due to the rain but it came in VERY handy keepung all you items on the stoller dry.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Sells

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: For stroller nicely and provided protection from color powder at color run. Unfortunately my granddaughter was freaked out about the enclosure and would not sit in stroller with it on. At a year and half of she had had it younger and was used to it I am sure it would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bee

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to fit my Britax B-Agile stroller comfortably. My little one was comfortable and could see ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to fit my Britax B-Agile stroller comfortably. My little one was comfortable and could see out no problem. Side flaps could be clipped up to provide circulation through mesh or clipped down to seal the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I brought for a Umbrella Chicco Stroller and fits perfect. I used for Disney Parks Vacations and rain a lot, and this cover perfectly, protects my baby and the stroller. 100% Recommended. Also the shipping was really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: as for the price, good products, block winds and rains, easy folding storage, only thing is it only last 1 season.
customer_reviews.author: Acadac

customer_reviews.title: Kept everything dry
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our Britax b-agile stroller at Disneyland and it worked great. It poured rain for about 4 hours and it kept the stroller and diaper bag completely dry! I have a tall 2 year old, so my sons shoes got a little wet because his feet stuck out under the poncho. But I was so glad I had the poncho and it was great quality. Lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best Stoller Accessory For Weather Protection
customer_reviews.text: This weather shield was a lifesaver and a must have for rainy days. It's easy to put on and off your stroller without any hassle. I have the Summer Infant 3D stroller and it covers the entire stroller with room to spare. My 2yr old has never complained and is very comfortable with it on the stroller. It folds up nicely and is easy to store in the basket under the stroller. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a stroller weather shield.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my stroller well
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit my Chicco stroller well. I had to keep adjusting it because it's not a good fit, although it has kept my little girl dry and protected her from the winds so I guess it has served it purpose. I've bought a different one which is a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Citi Mini GT
customer_reviews.text: We have a Citi Mini GT, and we really like the way this fits and covers the stroller. It has vents on the sides to allow breeze to go through. The only downside with this cover and our particular stroller is that we could not bring the stroller cover all the way down if we had this on. Like the quality and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I read that this has a strong plastic smell, well yes it does but i'm sure it will go away after a few walks in the rain and fresh air. It fits on my valco baby zee and is a LOT cheaper than the one they sell for it. Love the fact that it has a pocket on it and comes with a stroage bag. Don't think it would cover a toddler's feet but I don't have a toddler so that's not a problem for me yet. It does what it says it does and seems a fairly thick good quality one that won't break easily.
customer_reviews.author: High-Klass

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I have gotten this
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I have gotten this, so much great use for when it’s raining, it’s too cold, windy or if there’s lots of bugs around. I have been using it for different stroller sizes with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: It raining strollers,  hallelujah
customer_reviews.text: I have a graco three wheeled stroller. Nothing super fancy, I believe it's the snug ride? This fit perfectly. I reside in the pacific north west, so rain is what we get almost daily. Great product and I'll totally recommend it to all my mom friends!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fits G-luxe stroller great!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well made and I can tell it will last some time. I used it over our g-luxe stroller and it fit well (not too big or small) and was easy to place on and take off while we were out. The vents are great and keeps baby comfortable. The top flap where the stroller handles go through is also well placed. And I like that it has a storage bag (it's cheaply made but still helpful)! -1 star for the super plastic-y smell but it went away after airing for a few days. For this reason I will only use it with my baby for as short amount of time as possible.
customer_reviews.author: sfbadvr

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great from keeping my son dry and warm. They’re are snaps and vents on the side to keep the wind out keeping mosquitoes away
customer_reviews.author: NeNe

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price, shield is good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, good quality. The shield has side snaps which helped to keep it snug around the stroller. It was a bit breezy on the day I used it but the cover never shifted or moved, and baby was comfortable during our walk. I particularly like the side mesh panels for air circulation. I am curious however, to see how the plastic holds up in colder temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit tedious to fold back but the bag that comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: A little snug on my Graco Click Connect travel system but still works. It does smell once you open it but I believe nothing airing out and wiping/washing won't solve. It's a bit tedious to fold back but the bag that comes with it helps. Haven't used it for rain yet as my main purpose for getting it is for the wind. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: FA

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and Wrinkly
customer_reviews.text: This does the job but it's impossible to fold it back up because the plastic is very stiff and wrinkly. And if course now that it's so winkled the boy can't see out of it which defeats the purpose. A better quality plastic like Grandma covered the couch in would be preferable.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in Philly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for traveling. Material is thick enough to stay in shape but soft enough to fold. It is oversized for my Qbit stroller and you use the canopy to support it. It covers my child's feet, the storage underneath and the diaper bag hanging at the back. I did not buckle it around the stroller hander but leave the flap over the handle. This covered my hands in the rain and cold. We also used it in dry but cold weather to block out wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I have the chico bravo travel system and it works great. Folds up good and you can keep it with you at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Fabiana Forteau

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Yeah....awesome for use with my chicco bravo stroller. Little one loves it too
customer_reviews.author: another opinion

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR WALKING PARENTS!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. Alot of options, keeps the rain and wind out and fits very snug on the stroller, even with a baby seat on it (for younger babies). I can't recommend this item enough. Has pockets, snaps to let more air in, its just great.
customer_reviews.author: SonicSweeti

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Graco click connect which I currently use in the reclined "bassinet" position. Easy to put on, storage pockets are nice as is the ventilation. Smelled a little plasticky when first arrived (obviously, it's plastic!) which disappeared after laying it out for a night. Haven't had any problems with tears yet. However, it is a bit unwieldy when trying to fold up and store. Couldn't get it back in the bag in which it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our upcoming Disney trip! We haven't used it yet but it fits our stroller perfectly and I love that it's long enough to cover our daughters feet!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. They don't quite cover the feet so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Summer 3d Lite stroller as I walk my daughter to preschool every day and needed something a cover for rainy days. Works pretty good. They don't quite cover the feet so I need to make sure my daughter has rain boots on so her feet don't get soaked. But otherwise its a little larger and better fit than another one I purchased (don't remember which)
customer_reviews.author: grizzlebees

customer_reviews.title: Great rain cover!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for our regular stroller plus our large uppa baby vista stroller. We have gotten a lot of use out of it and not only protects your baby from rain but also wind. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and just righ size
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, the good part is that it last long
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fit on my Britax stroller
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a rainy day in Disneyland. It was perfect.. fit right over the entire stroller and kept things dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our City Mini prior to a Disney Wotld vacstion. It fits perfectly and kept my daughter dry. Its now made it through 3 trips and is incredibly durable through rain, wind, and getting shoved in a suitcase or closet. Easy to use every time!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, although it is not the most attractive but that's not why I purchased it so it doesn't really matter. Keeps our son protected from wind and rain in fall and spring!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggg!
customer_reviews.text: I love this weathershield because you can fit it onto multiple strollers and it folds up! I love the pockets and the window that is easy access to get to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my daughter as a gift. she doesn't have a car and needs to walk everywhere she goes
customer_reviews.author: Diane George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than the more expensive one made specifically for our Baby Jogger City Tour Lux. It's easy to put on and take off, and works whether the stroller is front facing or rear facing
customer_reviews.author: Diana Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It does a great job keeping the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It does a great job keeping the wind and cold off the baby while we go from daycare to home. It's perfect in the snow and rain. However, it is too small for our large stroller, but perfect for the mid-large. So I need to order a larger one for that stroller. But everytime I use it on cold days, I'm so thankful I have it. The baby is very comfortable and warm. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Coopers Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for those rainy days.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller cover kept everything dry and still able to use the stroller normally even with the cover on. Can't beat the cheap price and perfect fit. Only down side is my son's feet stick out the bottom and all the water runs down the front and onto his shoes. Wish it was a little longer to come down and fully cover his feet. he just has to pull his feet up or we just throw a plastic bag over his feet while riding to keep the water off.
customer_reviews.author: DDuck4Life

customer_reviews.title: ... tell how it works on rainy season but I like the fitting
customer_reviews.text: Haven't rained so I can't tell how it works on rainy season but I like the fitting. It fits perfectly on our Bravo stroller. I will update once I have used it on rainy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase, but could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Was easy to put on, easy to access baby while in stroller, and easy to get baby in and out of stroller while cover was con. Cons: Front flap didn't come far enough down in front, and so baby's shoes and bottom of pants got all wet. Would have been useful if there were Velcro straps on front bottom to connect to wheels so baby couldn't kick up.
customer_reviews.author: Spell

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this rain shield. Great price. We live in the Pacific Northwest, Seattle area and I take my Grandson for a stroll in the stroller rain or shine. Thank you for a great product. It came in the mail extra fast and that is a real plus. I like ordering from your web site. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Covers well, good ventilation and access points but tears too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used it recently and it totally covered my daughter in the stroller, even though she started playing with it after a while and took it halfway off! But by that time, the rain was dying down. It's great; I just keep it in the stroller and whip it out when I feel rain.
customer_reviews.author: Lina M T

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this... for rain, obviously, but also for cold days. We live in NYC, so we do lots of walking...this has been perfect for shielding our little guy from the wind/cold...and from curious hands on the subway. No joke. Highly recommend. Fits over our summer infant umbrella stroller.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly over our Citi Mini stroller. A bit bulky to store and difficult to fold (akes up the whole bottom storage section of the stroller), but keeps our daughter safe and dry when we're out in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for grandson's Eddie Bauer stroller. We live in Chicago and when the little guy is here we need to keep the wind off him. Fits the stroller perfectly and the storage sleeve is awesome too. Only complaint is that when the car seat is in the stroller it is hard to get it fully over the stroller. He is almost out of that car seat so I dont see anymore of an issue. For the price you will NOT be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Travlino

customer_reviews.title: This fits both our city mini gt and a compact ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits both our city mini gt and a compact stroller. This also works well when we attached a infant car seat on our city mini.
customer_reviews.author: J. W

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Graco stroller perfectly. It works very well. My baby is totally protected yet can see things very well! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Xintong

customer_reviews.title: Love it!💞
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect over the stroller and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It smells a little funny but it’s a great buy fits my daughter’s stroller perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works with chicco liteway
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my Chicco lite way and it fits pretty well. Used it in Disney when my some was 8 months and it kept both him and our items hanging on the stroller dry. Now that he's 2, his feet stick out and get wet, so I wish it was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm at Disneyland! It was raining off and on and cold and this did the job and kept my son warm and dry. Recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Must for regular stroller
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for rainy days! My toddler goes to daycare in a stroller everyday and some days it rains...This is nice to toss on and he stays dry. No issues with this. Easy to put on and take off. Easy to get the kid in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: J is for Jeep Deluxe Stroller Weather Shield, Baby Rain Cover, Universal Size, Waterproof, Water Resistant, Windproof, See Thru, Ventilation, Protection, Shade, Umbrella, Pram, Vinyl, Clear, Plastic
product_meta.description:
Product DescriptionThis Jeep Deluxe Stroller Weather Shield accommodates most stroller makes and models. It helps protect child form rain, snow, wind and cold weather. The netting on both sides provides plenty of ventilation. It comes with convenient essentials pocket. The Clear Vinyl Material allows you to keep a perfect eye on your child, while he/she gets to enjoy the views.From the ManufacturerWe Also offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee as we strongly stand by our products. If this product does not 100% satisfy your needs, we will fix it.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Jeep Deluxe Stroller Weather Shield accommodates most stroller makes and models. It helps protect child form rain, snow, wind and cold weather. The netting on both sides provides plenty of ventilation. It comes with convenient essentials pocket. This jeep stroller comes with accessories, weather shield.
feature_bullets: FULL CHILD PROTECTION: From Unfavorable Weather Conditions Such as Rain, Snow, Wind, and Cold Weather
UNIVERSAL SIZE: Rain Cover Fits Almost All Strollers
SUPER SIMPLE USE: Stroller Rain Cover installs in seconds, Just Unfold the Cover and Place Over your Stroller, There's Nothing to it!
PREMIUM VENTILATION: Rain Cover has Netting with Air Holes on Both Sides to make Sure Your Baby is Getting the Proper Air Flow Needed. Convenient Storage pocket is also Available

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Shop Happily knowing we Strongly Stand Behind this Weather Shield with Our Exclusive 100% Money Back Guarantee. If this Product Does Not 100% Satisfy Your Needs, Just Let us Know so we Can Fix It.
